text:
Fisheries (Abalone) Amendment Rules 2019

I make the following rules under the Living Marine Resources Management Act 1995 .

23 September 2019

GUY BARNETT

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    These rules may be cited as the Fisheries (Abalone) Amendment Rules 2019 .

2. Commencement
        (1) Except as provided by this rule, these rules take effect on the day on which the making of these rules is notified in the Gazette.
        (2) Part 2 takes effect on 1 November 2019.
        (3) Part 3 takes effect on 1 January 2020.

PART 2 - Fisheries (Abalone) Rules 2017 Amended

3. Principal Rules
    In this Part, the Fisheries (Abalone) Rules 2017 are referred to as the Principal Rules.

4.
    The amendments effected by this rule have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Fisheries (Abalone) Rules 2017 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 October 2019

These rules are administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
